markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Magic Fang](/Spells.aspx?ID=179)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 349 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Angazhan](/Deities.aspx?ID=72), [Angazhan](/Deities.aspx?ID=72), [Apsu](/Deities.aspx?ID=149), [Barbatos](/Deities.aspx?ID=64), [Dahak](/Deities.aspx?ID=150), [Lamashtu](/Deities.aspx?ID=11), [Rowdrosh](/Deities.aspx?ID=240), [Ydersius](/Deities.aspx?ID=211), [Zevgavizeb](/Deities.aspx?ID=82)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Choose one of the target's [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks. You cause that unarmed attack to shine with primal energy. The unarmed attack becomes a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280)_ unarmed attack, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of damage dice to two if it had only one.
name: Magic Fang
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 349 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Angazhan](/Deities.aspx?ID=72), [Angazhan](/Deities.aspx?ID=72), [Apsu](/Deities.aspx?ID=149), [Barbatos](/Deities.aspx?ID=64), [Dahak](/Deities.aspx?ID=150), [Lamashtu](/Deities.aspx?ID=11), [Rowdrosh](/Deities.aspx?ID=240), [Ydersius](/Deities.aspx?ID=211), [Zevgavizeb](/Deities.aspx?ID=82)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

 

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Make a creature's unarmed attacks magical temporarily.
</summary>
summary: Make a creature's unarmed attacks magical temporarily.
summary_markdown: Make a creature's unarmed attacks magical temporarily.
text: Magic Fang Source Core Rulebook pg. 349 4.0 Tradition Primal Deities Angazhan, Angazhan, Apsu, Barbatos, Dahak, Lamashtu, Rowdrosh, Ydersius, Zevgavizeb Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 willing creature Duration 1 minute --- Choose one of the target's unarmed attacks. You cause that unarmed attack to shine with primal energy. The unarmed attack becomes a +1 striking unarmed attack, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of damage dice to two if it had only one.
